faq.question: Is this image reサイズr really 無料?

faq.question: Are my images uploaded to your servers?

faq.question: What's the maximum file サイズ I can reサイズ?

faq.question: What's the difference between 'fit' and 'fill' modes?
faq.answer: Fit mode reサイズs images to fit within your 寸法 while preserving aspect ratio (images may be smaller than target). Fill mode crops images to fill exact 寸法, which may remove some content from the edges.

faq.question: Will all my images look the same サイズ?

faq.question: How much can I compress an image?
faq.answer: Typically, you can reduce file サイズs by 60-80% without noticeable 品質 loss. Results vary based on the image content and your 品質 settings. Photos compress better than graphics with lots of detAIl.

faq.question: Will compression reduce image 品質?
faq.answer: Compression involves a trade-off between file サイズ and 品質. At 70-80% 品質 settings, most people cannot see the difference. Our tool lets you preview and adjust the 品質 level before downloading.

faq.question: What's the 最高 フォーマット for compression?
faq.answer: WebP offers the 最高 compression with great 品質, but isn't universally supported. JPEG is 最高 for photos and has excellent browser support. PNG is lossless but creates larger files.

faq.question: Is there a file サイズ limit?
faq.answer: You can compress images up to 25MB. This limit is based on browser memory, not server restrictions (since we don't upload to servers).

faq.question: Can I batch compress multiple images?

faq.question: What 品質 setting should I use?
faq.answer: For web use, 70-80% is optimal. For printing or プロフェッショナル use, 85-95%. For maximum compression (like emAIl), 60-70% works well.

faq.question: Why convert PNG to JPG?
faq.answer: JPG files are much smaller than PNG for photos and complex images. PNG is 最高 for graphics with transparency or text, while JPG is better for photographs, reducing file サイズs by 70-90%.

faq.question: What happens to transparent backgrounds?
faq.answer: JPG doesn't support transparency. Our tool lets you choose a background color (white, black, or custom) to fill transparent areas. This gives you full control over the final appearance.

faq.question: Will I lose 品質 converting PNG to JPG?
faq.answer: PNG is lossless, while JPG uses compression. At 85-95% 品質 settings, 品質 loss is minimal and usually imperceptible. The file サイズ savings are worth the tiny 品質 trade-off for most uses.

faq.question: Can I convert JPG back to PNG?
faq.answer: Yes! Our フォーマット converter also handles JPG to PNG conversion. However, converting JPG to PNG won't recover transparency or improve 品質 - it just changes the フォーマット.

faq.question: What 品質 setting should I use?
faq.answer: For web and social media, 80-85% is perfect. For printing or プロフェッショナル use, 90-95%. For maximum file サイズ reduction, 70-75% still looks good.

faq.question: Why convert JPG to PNG?
faq.answer: PNG offers lossless 品質 and transparency support. It's ideal for graphics, logos, images that need editing, or when you need to preserve exact image 品質 without additional compression.

faq.question: Will converting improve my JPG 品質?
faq.answer: Converting won't improve existing JPEG compression artifacts, but it will prevent any additional 品質 loss. The image will look the same but in a lossless フォーマット.

faq.question: Will the file サイズ increase?
faq.answer: Yes, PNG files are typically larger than JPG because PNG is lossless. Expect 2-5x larger files for photographs. This is the trade-off for lossless 品質.

faq.question: Can I add transparency after converting?
faq.answer: Yes! Once in PNG フォーマット, you can use image editing software to remove backgrounds and add transparency. JPG doesn't support transparency.

faq.question: Is WebP supported everywhere?

features.title: 品質 or Target サイズ Mode
features.description: Choose 品質-based compression (1-100%) or set a target file サイズ in KB. The tool automatically finds optimal settings.

features.title: Real-Time Progress Tracking
features.description: See individual progress bars, file サイズs before and after, and compression ratios for each image as it processes.

features.title: Download as ZIP
features.description: Download all compressed images at once as a convenient ZIP file. Each file is named with '-compressed' suffix.

features.title: フォーマット Conversion
features.description: Convert images to JPEG, PNG, or WebP during compression. WebP offers the 最高 compression ratio.

features.title: 100% Private
features.description: All compression happens locally in your browser. Images never leave your device - complete プライバシー guaranteed.

useCases.title: Website Speed Optimization
useCases.description: Compress entire image libraries for websites. Reduce page load times significantly with bulk processing.
useCases.example: Compress 100 product photos from 50MB to 10MB for e-commerce site

useCases.title: Social Media Content
useCases.description: Prepare multiple photos for Instagram, Facebook, or other platforms with faster upload times.
useCases.example: Batch compress vacation photos for social media sharing

useCases.title: EmAIl Attachments
useCases.description: Send multiple photos via emAIl without hitting attachment サイズ limits.
useCases.example: Compress a photo album from 20MB to 4MB for emAIl

useCases.title: Cloud Storage Savings
useCases.description: Compress photo backups before uploading to cloud storage to save space and costs.
useCases.example: Compress 500 vacation photos from 10GB to 2GB before backup

benefits.title: Massive Time Savings
benefits.description: Compress up to 20 images at once instead of processing them individually.

benefits.title: Consistent 品質
benefits.description: Apply the same compression settings to all images for uniform results across your project.

benefits.title: Up to 80% サイズ Reduction
benefits.description: Reduce image file サイズs dramatically without noticeable 品質 loss using smart compression.

howItWorks.title: Upload Multiple Images
howItWorks.description: Select or drag up to 20 images. Supports JPEG, PNG, WebP up to 25MB each. Processing stays in your browser.

howItWorks.title: Choose Compression Mode
howItWorks.description: Set a 品質 level (1-100%) or enter a target file サイズ in KB. Select output フォーマット (JPEG, PNG, WebP).

howItWorks.title: Compress All Images
howItWorks.description: Click compress and watch as each image is processed. See real-time progress and compression results.

howItWorks.title: Download Results
howItWorks.description: Download individual images or get all compressed images as a single ZIP file. See total space saved.

faq.question: How many images can I compress at once?
faq.answer: You can compress up to 20 images at once. This limit ensures optimal browser パフォーマンス while providing efficient batch processing.

faq.question: What's the difference between 品質 and target サイズ modes?
faq.answer: 品質 mode (1-100%) gives you direct control over compression level. Target サイズ mode automatically finds the 最高 品質 to achieve a specific file サイズ in KB. Use target サイズ when you need files under a certAIn limit.

faq.question: Will compression reduce image 品質?
faq.answer: Compression involves a trade-off between file サイズ and 品質. At 70-80% 品質, most people cannot see the difference. Target サイズ mode automatically finds the 最高 品質 for your サイズ requirement.

faq.question: What's the 最高 フォーマット for compression?
faq.answer: WebP offers the 最高 compression (25-35% smaller than JPEG) with excellent 品質. JPEG is 最高 for photos and has universal browser support. PNG is lossless but creates larger files.

faq.question: Are my images uploaded to your servers?
faq.answer: No! All compression happens directly in your browser using Canvas API technology. Your images never leave your device, ensuring complete プライバシー.

faq.question: How does the target サイズ mode work?
faq.answer: Target サイズ mode uses binary search to automatically find the highest 品質 setting that achieves your target file サイズ. It tests multiple 品質 levels until it finds the optimal balance.

faq.question: Can I mix different image フォーマットs?
faq.answer: Yes! You can upload JPEG, PNG, and WebP images together. They'll all be converted to your chosen output フォーマット during compression.

faq.question: Is there a file サイズ limit?
faq.answer: Each image can be up to 25MB. This limit is based on browser memory, not server restrictions (since we don't upload to servers).
